description:
The field of Republican candidates hoping to move into the White House got a bit more crowded this week, and in that crowd, some messages are standing out more than others.

On Facebook, the GOP candidate's presidential announcement that grabbed the most Facebook chatter is none other than Donald Trump. In the 24 hours surrounding Mr. Trump's announcement on Tuesday, about 3.4 million people generated 6.14 million interactions -- likes, posts, comments and shares -- on Facebook about the candidate, according to data released by the social network on Wednesday. The only other candidate to come close to Mr. Trump's numbers is Sen.  (R., Texas).
title: The Donald Trumps GOP Candidates on Facebook
